casebody.data:
No. 09-571. Harry F. Connick, District Attorney, et al., Petitioners v. John Thompson. 559 U.S. 1004, 130 S. Ct. 1880,

176 L. Ed. 2d 399,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2612. March 22, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition.

Same case below, 578 F.3d 293.
